engine.mechanic: Roll 4 Fate dice (each shows +, blank, or -). Sum results (-4 to +4) and add skill rating. Compare to opposition or fixed difficulty.
engine.success: Tie = Success at minor cost or boost. Beat by 1-2 = Success. Beat by 3+ = Success with Style (get a boost or extra effect).
engine.crit: Success with Style (+3 or more over target): Gain a boost, inflict +1 shift of effect, or other narrative advantage.
engine.fumble: Fail by 3 or more: Succeed at serious cost OR fail dramatically.

procedures.conflict:
Physical or social conflict:
1. Set the scene: Zones, situation aspects
2. Determine turn order (Notice for physical, Empathy for social, or by narrative)
3. Each exchange, each participant takes one action:
   - Attack: Create advantage, then attack. Shifts become stress/consequences.
   - Create Advantage: Make aspects, get free invokes.
   - Overcome: Remove obstacles, aspects.
   - Defend: Oppose attacks (usually automatic).
4. Taking stress: Check boxes equal to shifts. If none available, take consequences.
5. Concession: Give up before taken out, but you get to narrate how you exit.
6. Taken Out: Opponent narrates your fate (within reason).
procedures.challenge:
Series of obstacles requiring multiple skills:
1. GM defines the challenge and component obstacles
2. Each obstacle requires an Overcome action with specific skill
3. Outcomes combine: All succeed = full success. Majority = success with complications. Minority = partial. None = failure.
4. Fate points and aspects work normally.
procedures.contest:
Opposed competition to achieve a goal first:
1. Define the goal and victory conditions
2. Each exchange, participants roll opposed Overcome
3. Winner gets 1 victory. Success with style = 2 victories.
4. First to 3 victories (or agreed number) wins.

fields.label: Careful
fields.usage_hint: Taking your time, being precise, avoiding mistakes.

fields.label: Flashy
fields.usage_hint: Drawing attention, being impressive, dramatic actions.

fields.label: Physical Stress
fields.threshold_hint: Check boxes to absorb shifts from physical attacks. If you can't absorb all shifts, take consequences or be Taken Out.

fields.label: Mental Stress
fields.threshold_hint: Check boxes to absorb shifts from mental/social attacks. If you can't absorb all shifts, take consequences or be Taken Out.

fields.label: Fate Points
fields.usage_hint: Spend to invoke aspects (+2 or reroll), power stunts, or refuse compels. Gain from compels or at session start (refresh).

fields.label: Refresh
fields.usage_hint: Fate Points reset to this at session start (if you have fewer). Reduced by extra stunts.

fields.label: Mild Consequence
fields.usage_hint: Absorbs 2 shifts. Clears at end of scene if addressed. Write the aspect here when taken.

fields.label: Moderate Consequence
fields.usage_hint: Absorbs 4 shifts. Clears after one full session if addressed.

fields.label: Severe Consequence
fields.usage_hint: Absorbs 6 shifts. Clears after one scenario if addressed.

fields.label: Extreme Consequence
fields.usage_hint: Absorbs 8 shifts. Permanently replaces one of your aspects.

fields.label: High Concept
fields.usage_hint: Who you are in a phrase. Can be invoked or compelled.

fields.label: Trouble
fields.usage_hint: Your recurring problem. Primary target for compels.

fields.label: Other Aspects
fields.usage_hint: 3 additional aspects from your story. Can be invoked or compelled.

fields.label: Stunts
fields.usage_hint: Special abilities that break normal rules. First 3 are free, additional cost 1 Refresh each.

fields.label: Extras
fields.usage_hint: Special permissions, gear, powers, or resources beyond normal.
